definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: ZJMP is located beside the outside round in the west suburb of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 公司位于上海西郊外环路旁。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 treats the design of the timing synchronization loop.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讲述了基于内插思想的同步环路设计。

sentences.english: The company is headquartered at No. 3 Nanhuan Road, Zhoutie Town, Southwest Suburb, Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 集团总部设在无锡市西南郊周铁镇南环路3号。

sentences.english: So the better route is the Fourth Ring Road , right?
sentences.chinese: 所以四环路更好些，是吗？

sentences.english: Scientists are just beginning to understand the brain's simplest circuits.
sentences.chinese: 科学家现在刚刚开始了解脑内最简单的环路。

sentences.english: A new bypass around the city is being built.
sentences.chinese: 一条新的绕城环路正在建设当中。

sentences.english: It had built local circuit and blood - brain barrier in the graft.
sentences.chinese: 移植物内已建立了局部神经环路，血脑屏障已形成。

sentences.english: The loops are connected by a cross-over section.
sentences.chinese: 这两个环路通过跨接部分彼此相连接。

sentences.english: More than 80 percent of the facilities will be built around the Fourth Ring Road .
sentences.chinese: 以上的场馆建在被称做“申奥大道”的四环路周围。

sentences.english: But the third-worst spot for highway congestion, Chicago's CircleInterchange, is going nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 但名列第三位拥堵的芝加哥环路交口却还不知去向。

sentences.english: An all fiber wavelength tunable loop mirror is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种全光纤波长可调谐环路反射镜。

sentences.english: Finally, the table of the optimal loop parameter values under different signal-to-noise ratios is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出了在不同信噪比下的最佳环路参数表。

sentences.english: If you drive, get on the Third Ring Road and head north.
sentences.chinese: 如果你开车，就上三环路然后向北。

sentences.english: It is possible to fly only over the Moscow Ring Road.
The headquarters is just off Beijing's east third ring road, surrounded by miles of concrete in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 该总部就在北京东三环路旁边，被钢筋混泥土包围着。

sentences.english: One of the key techniques of RPR is ring distributed fairness algorithm.
sentences.chinese: RPR中最关键的技术之一是环路分布式公平算法。

definition: ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
